item.title: A public tree has a broken brunch and a bigger one ready to go., 30th October
item.description:
A public tree's brunch broke down and an even bigger one is leaning dangerously over the road and pavement. It looks like it is about to split and fall any moment. Refer to the attached photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayne Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Overloaded skip., 30th October
item.description:
